# UIBarPosition.topAttached

**Case**

Specifies that the bar is at the top of the screen, as well as its containing view.

## Declaration

```swift
case topAttached
```

## Discussion

Bars with this position draw their background extended upwards, allowing their background content to show through the status bar.

## Constants

- **UIBarPosition.any**: Specifies that the position is unspecified.
- **UIBarPosition.bottom**: Specifies that the bar is at the bottom of its containing view.
- **UIBarPosition.top**: Specifies that the bar is at the top of its containing view.
